description.title: What is Twalk ?
description.text: Twalk is a dedicated app for small podcasts (Sometimes called 'streecast' or else)

why.title: Why Twalk ?
why.text:
I listen to a lot of podcasts and many of them are 'streetcasts'.
So many times I wanted to discuss with the host or other listeners on topics about these podcasts but I didn't found a good wayto talk with them.
So I dediced to try to develop Twalk.
